sourcesContent:
import './donation.css'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faShare, faExclamationTriangle, faUser } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; const Donation = ({ pictureUrl, title, username, amount, target, description }) => { const amountPercentage = (amount * 100) / target; const [shareWindowVisible, setShareWindowVisible] = useState(false); const [reportWindowVisible, setReportWindowVisible] = useState(false); const handleShare = () => { setShareWindowVisible(!shareWindowVisible); } const handleReport = () => { setReportWindowVisible(!reportWindowVisible); } return (

{title}

{username}
{amount}$ The target is to raise {target}$

Description

{description}

{/* Share Window */} {shareWindowVisible && (
Instagram
Telegram
Facebook
WhatsApp
TikTok
Twitter
)} {/* Report Window */} {reportWindowVisible && (

Report

{/* Content of the report window */}
)}
); } export default Donation;
